ygData.subject: Re: the AE heal
ygData.msgSnippet: That Spell Word of Healing is available in Freeport as well, i saw it today when i was buying my lvl 39 spells...there is a separate vendor for the healing
ygData.messageBody:
That Spell Word of Healing is available in Freeport as well, i saw it today
when i was buying my lvl 39 spells...there is a separate vendor for the
healing type spells, if you go in the front door and take a left, there
will be a room on your left hand side, the Male NPC there sells it.

Bree Wyndsdale
38th Cleric of Fennin Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: Azor <jmaynus@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, July 18, 1999 1:18 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] the AE heal


>From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
>I meant to look for that spell while in Qeynos, I went there to get the
head
>of Trumpy but got in such a big hurry to kill him and get back to Butcher I
>forgot to look for that spell. I'm glad I had a ride over close to Qeynos
>cause I really didn't want to wait on boat and then go through zone after
>zone just to kill Stumpy but he is worth it in a way. But I will keep an
>eye open for that lvl 49 AE heal spell.
>
>**************************
>Azor
>Lvl 18 Human Cleric of The Rathe
>**************************
>
>
>> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>>
>> ok i know today that the AE upgrade, word of healing does exist...heals
>> about the same as a greater heal, and i do believe it's lv 49....in any
>> case, it'd be a welcome change on the higher levels with that wimpy
>> group healing....healing on higher levels is like using light heal in
>> the 30s....not much count...but if any of you happen to see where to
>> purchase this spell, please fill me in....<i'm just lazy and don't feel
>> like popping into all the cleric guilds in norrath trying to find it> (;
>>
>> (\/)ystix Spellchaser
>> lv 42 cleric of The Rathe
